3 namespace Ubiquity\utils\http;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\http\session\SessionObject;
7 
15 class USession {
16  private static $name;
17 
25  public static function getArray($arrayKey) {
26  self::start ();
27  if (isset ( $_SESSION [$arrayKey] )) {
28  $array = $_SESSION [$arrayKey];
29  if (! is_array ( $array ))
30  $array = [ ];
31  } else
32  $array = [ ];
33  return $array;
34  }
35 
47  public static function addOrRemoveValueFromArray($arrayKey, $value, $add = null) {
48  $array = self::getArray ( $arrayKey );
49  $_SESSION [$arrayKey] = $array;
50  $search = array_search ( $value, $array );
51  if ($search === FALSE && $add) {
52  $_SESSION [$arrayKey] [] = $value;
53  return true;
54  } else if ($add !== true) {
55  unset ( $_SESSION [$arrayKey] [$search] );
56  $_SESSION [$arrayKey] = array_values ( $_SESSION [$arrayKey] );
57  return false;
58  }
59  }
60 
70  public static function removeValueFromArray($arrayKey, $value) {
71  return self::addOrRemoveValueFromArray ( $arrayKey, $value, false );
72  }
73 
83  public static function addValueToArray($arrayKey, $value) {
84  return self::addOrRemoveValueFromArray ( $arrayKey, $value, true );
85  }
86 
96  public static function setBoolean($key, $value) {
97  $_SESSION [$key] = UString::isBooleanTrue ( $value );
98  return $_SESSION [$key];
99  }
100 
108  public static function getBoolean($key) {
109  self::start ();
110  $ret = false;
111  if (isset ( $_SESSION [$key] )) {
112  $ret = UString::isBooleanTrue ( $_SESSION [$key] );
113  }
114  return $ret;
115  }
116 
126  public static function session($key, $default = NULL) {
127  self::start ();
128  return isset ( $_SESSION [$key] ) ? $_SESSION [$key] : $default;
129  }
130 
140  public static function get($key, $default = NULL) {
141  self::start ();
142  return isset ( $_SESSION [$key] ) ? $_SESSION [$key] : $default;
143  }
144 
152  public static function set($key, $value) {
153  $_SESSION [$key] = $value;
154  return $value;
155  }
156 
157  public static function setTmp($key, $value, $duration) {
158  if (isset ( $_SESSION [$key] )) {
159  $object = $_SESSION [$key];
160  if ($object instanceof SessionObject) {
161  return $object->setValue ( $value );
162  }
163  }
164  $object = new SessionObject ( $value, $duration );
165  return $_SESSION [$key] = $object;
166  }
167 
168  public static function getTmp($key, $default = null) {
169  if (isset ( $_SESSION [$key] )) {
170  $object = $_SESSION [$key];
171  if ($object instanceof SessionObject) {
172  $value = $object->getValue ();
173  if (isset ( $value ))
174  return $object->getValue ();
175  else {
176  self::delete ( $key );
177  }
178  }
179  }
180  return $default;
181  }
182 
183  public static function getTimeout($key) {
184  if (isset ( $_SESSION [$key] )) {
185  $object = $_SESSION [$key];
186  if ($object instanceof SessionObject) {
187  $value = $object->getTimeout ();
188  if ($value < 0) {
189  return 0;
190  } else {
191  return $value;
192  }
193  }
194  }
195  return;
196  }
197 
204  public static function delete($key) {
205  self::start ();
206  unset ( $_SESSION [$key] );
207  }
208 
216  public static function inc($key, $inc = 1) {
217  return self::set ( $key, self::get ( $key, 0 ) + $inc );
218  }
219 
227  public static function dec($key, $dec = 1) {
228  return self::set ( $key, self::get ( $key, 0 ) - $dec );
229  }
230 
238  public static function concat($key, $str, $default = NULL) {
239  return self::set ( $key, self::get ( $key, $default ) . $str );
240  }
241 
249  public static function apply($key, $callback, $default = NULL) {
250  $value = self::get ( $key, $default );
251  if (is_string ( $callback ) && function_exists ( $callback )) {
252  $value = call_user_func ( $callback, $value );
253  } elseif (is_callable ( $callback )) {
254  $value = $callback ( $value );
255  } else {
256  return $value;
257  }
258  return self::set ( $key, $value );
259  }
260 
268  public static function Walk($callback, $userData = null) {
269  self::start ();
270  array_walk ( $_SESSION, $callback, $userData );
271  return $_SESSION;
272  }
273 
280  public static function replace($keyAndValues) {
281  self::start ();
282  $_SESSION = array_replace ( $_SESSION, $keyAndValues );
283  return $_SESSION;
284  }
285 
291  public static function getAll() {
292  self::start ();
293  return $_SESSION;
294  }
295 
302  public static function start($name = null) {
303  if (! self::isStarted ()) {
304  if (isset ( $name ) && $name !== "") {
305  self::$name = $name;
306  }
307  if (isset ( self::$name )) {
308  \session_name ( self::$name );
309  }
310  \session_start ();
311  }
312  }
313 
319  public static function isStarted() {
320  return session_status () == PHP_SESSION_ACTIVE;
321  }
322 
330  public static function exists($key) {
331  self::start ();
332  return isset ( $_SESSION [$key] );
333  }
334 
342  public static function init($key, $value) {
343  if (! isset ( $_SESSION [$key] )) {
344  $_SESSION [$key] = $value;
345  }
346  return $_SESSION [$key];
347  }
348 
352  public static function terminate() {
353  if (! self::isStarted ())
354  return;
355  self::start ();
356  $_SESSION = array ();
357 
358  if (\ini_get ( "session.use_cookies" )) {
359  $params = \session_get_cookie_params ();
360  \setcookie ( \session_name (), '', \time () - 42000, $params ["path"], $params ["domain"], $params ["secure"], $params ["httponly"] );
361  }
362  \session_destroy ();
363  }
364 }
